title: Path of center of meterstick as it falls

content.question: A meterstick is held as shown above and then released from rest. The tabletop has negligible friction. Which figure below best indicates the path of the center of mass of the meterstick as it falls?

choices.label: The figure presents a dot with a curved arrow extending from it. The arrow extends approximately horizontally to the right from the dot, and then curves downward so that the tip of the arrow points vertically downward.
The figure presents a dot with a straight arrow extending from it. The arrow points downward and to the right.
The figure presents a dot with a straight arrow extending from it. The arrow points vertically downward.

The figure presents a dot with a curved arrow extending from it. The arrow extends approximately vertically downward from the dot, and then curves to the left so that the tip of the arrow points horizontally to the left.

content.answer: The figure presents a dot with a straight arrow extending from it. The arrow points vertically downward.
